content.detailedDescription: I was driving along veterans memorial highway when i saw about 8 strongly glowing orange orbs in the sky. i am used to seeing planes fly over in to islip but these were higher than the planes in the usually flight path to land and were moving in all kinds of directions at a high rate of speed for their distance and altitude. some were brighter than the others and all same blinking lights. i had never seen anything like it. it caught my attention right away because it looked so different than the usual planes in the area. some other people stopped to look on as well. i looked online and there were the same orange orbs reported in brooklyn the same night.
content.summary: About 8 very bright orange orbs that also had blinking triangular lights moving around long island sky near islip airport.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a professional photographer with 7 years of experience. i have a wide scope of projects i have completed ranging from architecture, to events, fashion, landscape, commercial, art, etc..

i was leaving a wedding that i had photographed in alvin, texas on 5/20/2012.  i observed what looked like a plane in the distance while driving south-west on county road 539 at 1:25am.  i almost ignored the lights in the sky when i noticed that there was a strange pulse of orange light coming from the object.  i slowed down and kept watching the craft.  
there was a small red-light at each point of the triangular shaped craft (very similar to those on an aircraft).

the craft started to get larger and i could see it was coming closer.  i started to believe that it was the top of a tower or antenna due to the low altitude and pulsing. (the orange light on the bottom of the craft would get bright for 2 seconds and dim. this would repeat every 2 seconds.)
    
i saw that it was passing to my left about 200 feet away just above the tree lines over the alvin golf country club.  there was a break in the tree-line and i actually slowed and finally stopped the car when i saw clearly a black triangle shape passing by slowly.  it was silently and steadily moving about 15-20mph heading north-east.  i had my driver-side window down and watched as it flew past me and my car.  i immediately grabbed my camera and made a u-turn to follow it and attempt to snap some photographs.

i hurriedly and excitedly snapped 4 photographs before it disappeared into the distance on its north-east path around 1:30am.  i was doing this while driving so the photographs have motion blur.  i have attached two of the photographs of the object where it can be seen as well as a rough-sketch from my perspective in the car.

some interesting observations:
-the craft was black- although the sky was dark, i could easily see a dark triangular shape against the dark sky.
-the craft was also relatively thick.  i would say that it was about 15 feet tall at most and about as big as a large car.  by my estimation, it would fit perfectly on a two-car driveway that many homes have.
-the edges were not sharp but rounded.
-i was shocked at how silent it was when it passed.
-the pulsing light gave me the impression that it was a kind of signal to let other flying planes or helicopters see that it was there to prevent a crash.
content.summary: Black triangle craft heading north east

content.detailedDescription: Saw red orange orb pulsating from work place in the sky. in the northeastern direction from atlanta. glowed a bright red-orange light, stopped, and continued to hover. light got dimmer and dimmer, until object disappeared. saw two commercial jets fly by the object. not sure if they were close to each other. i hope this helps. please e-mail me if you have any more questions. thank you!
content.summary: Red orange orb pulsating, hovered, stopped, dimmed light, and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Taking pictures in detroit for a class on composure of pictures.  i blew up the picture when i got home there it was. 
don't  kwow what to think. 
my camera is a sony a55. this object is not a dirty lens blew up all pictures for the day and one on a clear blue sky on sunday morning and nothing like this appears in any other photo. 
when you look at the main picture you probably will not see anything at all. perhaps you will see a small dust speak in between the building. the speak is directly below the left contrail in the picture. 
upon blowing up the picture it is apparent that there is something there.
maybe it nothing but a childs balloon, however on close inspection changing colors contrast ect. it does appear to glow top and bottom and seems to have an effect on the air around it. just thought it interesting.
content.summary: Never saw it with my eyes, however when ioaded the picture on my computer i blew it up to see if i could see the planes in the picture and there it was.

content.detailedDescription: I will provide details as necessary, but i will be shocked if others didn't see and video them.  one of the few times i have ever left home without my smartphone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside my house on back deck around 2100 on may 19, 2012. i looked up toward tree tops and noticed a very large deep orange pulsating ball of light that appeared to be moving slowly at first, then shoot upward and disappear in 2-3 seconds. my view of the object was never obscured. as i excitedly called out to my family to come see, another approached in the exact same path coming from the north toward southeast. the view was from approx 4 miles away to over my area in 5 seconds to shoot upward in a 45 degree angle completely out of sight in 2-3 seconds. a total of 9 objects about the size of a football field were observed by 5 adults in my household. no sound, no emissions, just very bright pulsating lights. my husband said he could see that each object had 3-tiered lights that surrounded each. the night was quiet, no dogs barking, no other planes or helicopters were seen during sightings. after the last one was gone, regular airplane traffic was seen in the far distance. 
everyone in my house was excited, in awe, not afraid, just currious as to what we had just witnessed.
content.summary: 5 witnesses saw 9 deep orange pulsating in straight path shoot upward at speed of light

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside with my wife observing the solar eclipse. we were taking turns using sun glasses to look at the sun. when from the corner of my eye i noticed something in the sky. 
at first i thought it might be a bunch of foil balloons someone had let loose. but upon second look i realized it wasnt moving up or with the direction of the wind it was at a steady pace keeping the same altitude moving in a straight path toward the sun(west). 
the object at first glance looked literally like a bunch of foil balloons. one in the middle straight up and down and four of them around it. thighly grouped together. the object was spinning very slowly clockwise and was moving forward only at about 100 mph. it did not move up or down or any other way besides the slow rotation. it moved forward until it was out of sight.
my wife was freaking out while i was trying to take a picture of it with her phone but was unable to do so as her phone was having some weird malfunction which i had to power it off and back on to correct. 
i finally lost sight of the object as it headed in the same direction until the sun was making it difficult to view.
content.summary: Was watching solar eclipse. ufo came into view from behind me flying westward toward the sun

content.detailedDescription: Walking home with friends and saw two orange glowing objects flying over city from west to east. they started off glowing bright and then dimmed out but i could see the objects still. i thought maybe it could be

Tonight, my family and i was standing outside looking at the stars, when all the sudden, this huge ball of light was heading straight toward us. coming from the south/west. it was very low in the sky. it got close, then changed directions, but before it change direction, it went dark, then started blinking like crazy. heading north/west. it gave me the chills

My husband and i where out on our deck in the back yard around 11:30 may 19 2012 in lansing mi when i noticed a very bright orange circular light appear over the trees on the other street. i noticed right away that this light was moving kind of quick for a plane or helicopter and did not appear to have any flashing lights like on the wings of a plane or the bottom of a helicopter. both my husband and i got up and went into the yard to get a better view. as the light got closer over head we noticed it wasn't making a sound. the object came from the south and was moving north at a good pace. it was flying at about the height that a police chopper would fly when looking for some one on the ground. my husband tried to get video on his phone but only managed to capture 8 seconds of darkness and our amazed voices unfortunately. the object was over our pine tree with in a matter of a minute or so, and my husband and i scrambled to the deck to see it come over the other side. there was nothing there though. at the rate it was going before we lost it over the tree we should have been able to see it on the other side when we got to the deck but no dice. i have no idea what we saw last night, but i have never seen any thing like it before. i never thought i would witness any thing abnormal in the sky, but there it was. hubby and i are both skeptics, but now we're both more open to the idea of ufo's. only wish we could have gotten proof.

Brooklyn rooftop... a bunch of us noticed 2 orange lights moving fast in the sky... linear.... lights moved but not closer together (as if it was on a single object). 3rd light appeared with the 2, then all disappeared. 5 mins later, 2 more orange lights one on top of the other, moving in a waving type movement...But always one on top of the other. disappeared in same area as previous one. 5 mins later...Another set of the double moving lights.

color was orange/yellow.... very noticeable in the sky. seemed a lot lower closer to the ground than stars appear to be. no airplanes in the sky at the time. (around 1am or so may 19th into may 20th). 25+ witnesses on the roof at the time looking at the lights.

after first sighting, was very curious... contimplated if it could be an aircraft. (there were no headlights or anything & it disappeared into nowhere!). when we noticed the 2nd set of lights.... we were in awe. the 3rd set was identical to the 2nd.

almost as if the 2nd and 3rd set of lights were following the first steady (and larger in size as far as distance between the lights) set of lights.

later read on the internet that similiar sightings of these orange lights/orbs were seen in other areas!

not sure if anyone snapped photos or video...Being that it was an event

My in-laws were visiting our house (near se 60th and foster in portland), and we had just come inside the house about 8:30 pm on march 19th 2012.  my father-in-law called us back outside to show us a glowing orange light coming noiselessly from the south.  the object appeared vaguely orb-shaped, or at least the glowing orange light did.  the light did not blink like an airplane.  it possibly pulsated somewhat, but that may have been the effect of the atmosphere.  it curved gently to the east before it got overhead, and as it did, the light went out, and we saw a dark shape against the still-light sky.  we couldn't really identify what the shape looked like.  then another orange light came from the same direction he first had, and followed the same path.  we saw between 6 and 8 of these objects do the exact same thing.  sometimes two or three were within view at the same time, but all along the same path.  they seemed to move about the speed of an ultralight - on the slower side.  but they were close enough that we should have heard them if they were planes or ultralights.  no sound.  i looked at the objects with a spotting scope, but couldn't see any more detail in the shape.  just glowing, circular light, then a dark shape against the sky.  five of us witnessed the phenomenon.
content.summary: Series of 6-8 orange glowing lights coming from the south and gently turning east

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my car when i saw it it was triangle and had lights and it shot a laser at a cylinder

I just saw ~42   black triangle rotating objects, and 2 white, 1 blue,1 green lights. there was red glowing fireballs, they ejected some red light streams into the clouds and then black triangle objects changed their form and transform into some boomerang shaped objects with lights. one of black objects was above me (~100 meters), he floating very slowly, rotating and blinking , he didn't make any sounds. then i saw rest of objects. i observed this event about 2-3 hours and they seemed they were like living creatures not just machines(but this is just mine opinion)
i was in my yard when this happened.
i just looked up and saw some red fireball and then this fireball started to move, after that i saw some black triangles, they moving slowly. one green fireball appear and gone in a few seconds later, same happened with blue fireball, and there were some white lights they just blinking and moving around black objects but not very long time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Big triangle rotating object and white,red, blue, green lights

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside to look up at stars. this is my ususal pre bedtime routine. noticed small bright sphere, about the size of a satellite, zigzagging rapidly around the sky (think pinball)then moved quickly in straight line south east and faded from view. while processing that i observed a 2nd sphere, looked the same as the 1st, moved rapidly from northwest to southeast, in sort of an arc, no trail, faded from view. few seconds later observed what i though initially was a satellite moving from east to west (with some relief i might add) but it moved too fast and again faded from view. i have observed many satellites and usually they have not moved across the sky as quickly and can be observed for quite some time. the ligt or glow never appeared to vary. i did look around the sky for airplanes to compare the lights against these spheres.
there were at least 2 planes (pretty typical to see many planes as we are surrounded by airports), at much lower altitude with typical blinking lights. the 1st sphere i observed was what caused a feeling of mild alarm, heightened awareness and curiosity due to its very rapid and erratic pattern.
content.summary: Small bright sphere (think satellite) that zig zagged rapidly then faded...
